CLOSING THREAD

Have 4 Commons graded by BVG available......and 3 ungraded

Buyer pays $2 shipping regardless of how many you buy. PayPal friends and family please. Willing to deal, but anyone saying "I'll take it" gets priority.

If you have any beater EPDGs I need, would be willing to give favorable trades. Let me know what you got. I also need some upgrades, so will listen to what you got.


$SOLD Dave Brain BVG 2. Pretty darn nice for the grade
$SOLD Dan Moeller BVG 3.
$ Joshua Clark BVG 3.
$ Jack White BVG 3.5.
